The game is very broken, sometimes, but it is still good and lovable. If you get it, there will be updates that inevitably break the characters and things you liked about it, but that's part of the fun. Best to play with friends on a call, so that you can rag about these things with them. Bring a snack, because loading times are like 1-2 minutes, best spent with the aforementioned friends.
I love ruining my mental health <3

Dead By Daylight is very good horror game to play with your friends.
First 50 hours, amazing. But once you get to high MMR, you'll need a strong spirit to keep going. Oh, and even if you can bear the high MMR it's still shitty lmao.

I'm editing my review to be positive, but leaving in my original complaints about the game because they still hold true. Overall, I do generally enjoy this game. It's fun to play, especially with friends, and the new DLC coming out in March looks like it's going to be really cool. 

However, lobby wait times can be extremely long as a survivor, and many killers seem to prefer to facecamp, or slug and force people to wait to bleed out over long minutes rather than playing the game in a way that actually makes it enjoyable. Unfortunately the company shrugs off this behaviour, so people keep doing it. Waiting in long cues just to get griefed isn't exactly my idea of a good time. 

Basically, when it's good it's great, but when it's bad it's horrible.

this game is really fun with friends or alone! It not as scary as it seems but it is heat pumping when ever you're in a chase! Great game 10/10!

One of my favorite games. Do not buy this.

I was unaware of how to report an incident of cheating. I had hear that there have been a lot of cheaters playing as survivors, but I have been playing a lot with 4 man groups of friends, meaning this had not been an issue for me. I tried to report a very obvious incident of cheating where i could not control my killer character while there was a survivor on my shoulder. If I tried to walk anywhere, I would be taken back to where I picked up the character immediately. Additionally, all of the survivors could use the dead hard perk at will. I started a chat to try to report the incident, and after about 3 minutes or so into the chat was told I could not be helped reporting the cheating incident. I really enjoyed this game and have put time and money into it just to be told I can't help you to report cheating...........ridiculous.
This game is frustrating. It makes me want to cry. BUT playing with friends is a good time. Play with friend first, then you may enjoy this!

I hate this game but I guess it's ok. Very fun with friends.

They managed to create a very cinematic experience that can last a maximum of 5 hours, after that you're playing a goofy multiplayer game. 

Visuals are good, sounds are good.
Balance is trash.
Perks are fun.
Hackers aren't fun.
Characters are cool and usually fun.

Progression can take THOUSANDS of hours, do not think that you'll be able to get every perk on every character, but BHVR likes to hand more and more bloodpoints out the smaller their playerbase gets so that helps.
10/10 would get bred in the basement again
